程序包 view

类 ViewBase

java.lang.Object
view.ViewBase
所有已实现的接口:
ViewMaker
直接已知子类:
ViewDrag, Viewplants, ViewPwork
public class ViewBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewMaker
The parents class for each views
版本:
final
作者:
Benny Li, Huawei Wang, yuzu Wu,Ruiheng Xie,

  • 构造器详细资料

    • ViewBase

      public ViewBase​(javafx.stage.Stage stage, javafx.event.EventHandler<? super javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> handlerP, javafx.event.EventHandler<? super javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> handlerN)
      Show the stages for the childrenViews and catch the null stages
      参数:
      stage - , HandlerP, HandlerN Stage stage: stage for ChildrenVIews EventHanddler HandlerP: back button for each page EventHanddler HandlerN: next button for each page
